    • executorService

      private final transient ExecutorService executorService
      The Executor service. the executor is a thread that can be fed a queue of Runnable or Callable, such as lambda expressions or method-like expressions, and that executes them in order it is used to de-synchronize the RMI calls, that now don't wait for the return at the end of the method execution, but return after submitting the Runnable to the executor
